Jumbotron.title: Hi, I'm NiyasRahman.
Jumbotron.text: My name's Niyas Rahman. I'm a front-end developer from Kerala, India and Welcome to my site. I work with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My current projects use ReactJS as the view library.
